open Visp.Runtime.Library

let state = { Todo = () }
// line 2 @"example-4.visp"
let mutable value =
  "initial"
// line 3 @"example-4.visp"
printfn ("value is %s") (value)
// line 5 @"example-4.visp"
let foo =
  // line 5 @"example-4.visp"
  (fun arg ->
    // line 5 @"example-4.visp"
    value <- arg)
// line 7 @"example-4.visp"
foo ("hello")
// line 8 @"example-4.visp"
printfn ("value is %s") (value)
// line 10 @"example-4.visp"
foo ("world")
// line 11 @"example-4.visp"
let visp_result_todo =
  // line 11 @"example-4.visp"
  printfn ("value is %s") (value)
// line 11 @"example-4.visp"
printfn ("%O") (visp_result_todo)
